quote: Try for once to justify the meaning of your existence as it were a posteriori by setting yourself an aim, a goal... an exalted and noble 'to this end.' Perish in pursuit of this and only this
author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Untimely Meditations

quote: Rise to the challenge of bringing your dreams to life! Do not be discouraged by resistance, be nourished by it. Success is the experience of rising to the level of your true greatness.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance, all things are attainable
author: Thomas Fowell Buxton

quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
author: Zane Grey

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: Think of yourself as on the threshold of unparalleled success. A whole, clear, glorious life lies before you. Achieve! Achieve!
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Whatever success I may have attained is due to the fact that since I was old enough to work at all, my ambition has never deserted me.
author: Anna Held

quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy ideal
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: The ambitions are wake up, breathe, keep breathing.
author: Nicole Blackman,  Blood Sugar

quote: The ethos of redemption is realied in self-mastery, by means of temperance, that is, continence of desires.
author: Pope John Paul II,  Blessed Are the Pure of Heart: Catechesis on the Sermon on the Mount and Writings of St. Paul

quote: If you can think about it, you can achieve it. The difference between your thought and achievement are your self-doubt, and fear of failure. The longer you will take to start, the longer you will take to reach your destination. Seeds of everything that we see around were first sown in the mind.
author: Sanjeev Himachali

quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The more aware of your intentions and your experiences you become, the more you will be able to connect the two, and the more you will be able to create the experiences of your life consciously. This is the development of mastery. It is the creation of authentic power.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: If your dreams are to hard to achieve, just achieve
author: Benny Bellamacina,  Piddly Poems for Children, v.2

quote: Success is within reach of all people, but you can grasp it only when you realise the power within you.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: I strive for perfection - I settle for satisfaction
author: Carroll Bryant

quote: No student ever attains very eminent success by simply doing what is required of him: it is the amount and excellence of what is over and above the required, that determines the greatness of ultimate distinction.
author: Charles Kendall Adams

quote: We shall never achieve harmony with the land, anymore than we shall achieve absolute justice or liberty for people. In these higher aspirations the important thing is not to achieve but to strive.
author: Aldo Leopold,  Round River: From the Journals of Aldo Leopold

quote: The ethos of redemption is realized in self-mastery, by means of temperance, that is, continence of desires.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: Desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire which transcends everything.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is realising the true joy and wonder of life can only be yours if you follow your own intuition, aiming to achieve your bliss.
author: Steven Redhead,  The Solution

quote: Aim high, aim at the highest, and all lower aims are thereby achieved. It is looking below on the stormy sea of differences that makes you sink. Look up, beyond these and see the One Glorious Real, and you are saved.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: If you are able to focus unswervingly on your goals, then all that you desire will become yours.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: The desire to reach for the stars is ambitious. The desire to reach hearts is wise.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: When you believe in yourself sufficiently and are confident that everything that you desire is inside you then you will possess the ability to produce all that you wish for.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study;but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
author: Marilyn Vos Savant

quote: Acquiring knowledge is a form of imitation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: I may grow rich by an art I am compelled to follow; I may recover health by medicines I am compelled to take against my own judgment; but I cannot be saved by a worship I disbelieve and abhor.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: My ambition is handicapped by laziness
author: Charles Bukowski,  Factotum

quote: ‎Determination, effort, and practice are rewarded with success.
author: Mary Lydon Simonsen,  The Perfect Bride for Mr. Darcy

quote: If you understand others you are smart.If you understand yourself you are illuminated.If you overcome others you are powerful.If you overcome yourself you have strength.If you know how to be satisfied you are rich.If you can act with vigor, you have a will.If you don't lose your objectives you can be long-lasting.If you die without loss, you are eternal.
author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching

quote: It goes without saying that it's hard to attain a certain level of success.
author: T.I.

quote: We cannot reach the pinnacle except by taking advantage of the abilities we have and acquiring those that we do not.
author: محمد عبد الرحمن العريفي,  Enjoy Your Life

quote: To sense the peace of extinguished passionHappiness in not knowing the ultimate knowledge
author: Dejan Stojanovic,  The Sign and Its Children

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's the determination and commitment to unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: The ladder of success is there waiting for you... you just have to realize it and reach towards and climb as high as you can you will surely be successful.
author: Noor Ahmad

quote: It is during our failures that we discover our true desire for success.
author: Kevin Ngo,  Let's Do This! 100 Powerful Messages to Help You Take Action

quote: The quest for knowledge is passion to study.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Success is about enjoying what you have and where you are, while pursuing achievable goals.
author: Bo Bennett
